sentences.en: He qualified his friend as an ambitious self - seeker .
sentences.cn: 他把他的朋友说成是野心勃勃的 利己主义 者.

sentences.en: He was a New England seer and seeker.
sentences.cn: 他是新英格兰的先知,又是探索者.

sentences.en: He's a self - seeker. He's always on the make.
sentences.cn: 这个人才奸哪, 总想占便宜.

sentences.en: I am a seeker after truth.
It matches a knowledge seeker with the best source of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 它将知识寻找者与最佳的知识源匹配起来.

sentences.en: James Potter won a Seeker award for Gryffindor in 1973.
sentences.cn: 詹姆·波特为格兰芬多赢得了一项关于找球手的奖项在1973年.

sentences.en: Job - Seeker Tip: Looking for a job is also a competition.
sentences.cn: 求职小贴士: 找工作也是一项竞争.

sentences.en: That chap is just a self - seeker.
The active radar seeker has an acquisition range of up to 40 km.
sentences.cn: 主动雷达导引头收索范围可达40千米.

sentences.en: The reader combines these two meanings to light on the seeker's question.
sentences.cn: 解读者根据这2个意义的结合来给予求问者问题的指导.

sentences.en: The UAV's radar seeker constantly search for hostile radar signal.
sentences.cn: UAV的雷达搜索头通过搜索敌方雷达信号.

sentences.en: This paper discusses the direction finding characteristic of passive monopulse seeker.
sentences.cn: 主要讨论被动单脉冲导引头对旁瓣目标的识别.

sentences.en: This paper discusses the two - position detecting scheme for flexible gyro - based north seeker.
sentences.cn: 讨论了挠性陀螺寻北仪二位置寻北方案.

sentences.en: Three Chasers, two Beaters, one Keeper and a Seeker.
sentences.cn: 三个追球手, 两个击球手还有守门员和找球手.

sentences.en: What if I am a refugee or asylum seeker?
sentences.cn: 如果我是难民或政治避难者,该 怎么办 ?

trans.tran_cn: 搜索者，探求者，搜查人，自动导引的弹头
trans.tran_en: someone who is trying to find or get something
